description:
We're back with one of the best speakers in the international circuit with an absolutely blinding talk!

**Aprol (Edwards) Yoho**, the Senior Developer Advocate & DevOps Practice Lead at GitHub will be joining us to give us an update on some of the super cool stuff that the team at Github have been working on.

GitHub Copilot can streamline your coding workflow in various ways. While we have all tried and tested GitHub Copilot in our IDEs, let's look at how to use Copilot to make use more efficient and better developers. In this session, we're going to go beyond the usual tips and trips, look at how we can use GitHub Copilot to write test plans, create documentation and allow us to be more productive with the tasks that we love.

We're being hosted by our sponsors, IO in central Bristol who will be providing refreshments and a venue. We're limited in space so please make sure you RSVP if you can make it - Look forward to seeing you all there!
title: Beyond GitHub Tips and Tricks: .NET development and testing with GitHub
